verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I am afraid, I call upon the Lord.
When I'm in distress, I call upon His holy name.
He hears my faintest cry. He feels my every pain.
He knows just what I am, and yet,
He loves me just the same.
Nothing; nothing; nothing.
Oh nothing can divide us from His love, from His love.
Oh nothing can divide us from his love.
